description:
Madonna - Remixed & Revisited [2003] [only1joe] FLAC-EAC

Remixed & Revisited is a remix album by American singer-songwriter Madonna. It was released on November 24, 2003 by Maverick Records and distributed by Warner Bros. Records. The album contains four songs, in remixed form, from her 2003 ninth studio album American Life and a previously unreleased song, "Your Honesty," originally written for her 1994 sixth studio album Bedtime Stories. The other tracks included are the live performance of "Like a Virgin" and "Hollywood" on the 2003 MTV Video Music AwardsÃ¢â‚¬â€which ended with Madonna kissing co-performers Britney Spears and Christina AguileraÃ¢â‚¬â€and a remix of 1985 single "Into the Groove". The release peaked at number 115 on the Billboard 200 in the United States. It received mixed reviews from critics; "Your Honesty" was generally the only song to receive praise. The remix album also marked the closing release under her contract with Maverick Records. the remix album has had sales of around 250,000..
